content.description: Climb a right slanting crack/seam which dies out midway up the face, clip a solitary bolt and run it out to the top on steep smears and patina edges. A good route for those solid at the grade or an even better toprope after leading the route to the right.
content.location:
Center of the east face and just left of

Saddle Sores (aka Do Rein Me)

.

climbs.name: Saddle Sores (aka Do Rein Me)
climbs.fa: Todd Swain and Donette Smith, 11/95, FL: Chris Miller & Max Davenport, 10/97

content.description: Climbs a well-protected vertical face to arete on mostly good patina edges to the top of the formation. A well-protected route for those leading at the grade.
content.location:
The northeast arete of the formation  and just left of

Shit Happens

. The route faces away from the road.

content.description:
Redskin is on the north side of a huge boulder/block called The Saddlehorn Formation, located in the narrow canyon just right of

The Kid

The route will be facing you as you approach it (same apprach as for The Kid and Walk on the Wild Side). Start by climbing to the top of an adjacent block, then stem over to clip the first bolt. Climb overhanging patina past 4 bolts, then make a delicate move right around the arete and finish with slabbier face past 2 more bolts. 2 bolt anchor on top with 70 foot rappel. Maybe two out of five stars.

climbs.name: Cat Burglar
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines, Pat Dennis, Alan Bartlett, Steve Gerberding, 12/05

content.description: As you approach The Saddlehorn Formation (which is the huge block just right of The Kid) this route can be seen as the arete on the right side of the north face of the block. It joins the route Redskin at Redskin's 5th or 6th bolt. At the 4th bolt you have an option: up and right (5.8, slightly more runnout) to Redskin's 6th and final bolt(5 bolts total),or, straight up (5.9) to Redskin's 5th bolt for a slightly more difficult variation (6 bolts total).One star out of five. 70 foot rappel off the overhanging north face.
content.protection: 5 or 6  bolts, 2 bolt belay/rappel anchor 70 ft.
